about:
Passionate about the future of finance and money and focused on crypto.

Highlights

- Co-founder of crypto hedge fund Nine Blocks Capital Management - >$200m AuM institutionally focused market neutral crypto hedge fund

- Former PwC Global Crypto Leader and Partner

- Co-founder and Chairman of ACX International - world's largest crypto specialised compliance services firm

- Co-Host of CNBC Arabia show Crypto Weekly - 60 million viewers across MidEast/GCC each week

- 500K+ LinkedIn followers, Host of CryptoCapsules™ LinkedIn video series

- 50K+ newsletter subscribers, The Future of Money with Henri Arslanian

- Host of The Future of Money with Henri Arslanian podcast (ranked in top 5% of all podcasts globally on Spotify)

- Adjunct Professor, University of Hong Kong, teach first FinTech/crypto university course globally since 2015, host of highest rated crypto course on Udemy

- Best-selling author of “The Future of Finance: the Impact of FinTech, AI and Crypto on Financial Services” (Palgrave, 2019) and "The Book of Crypto" (Palgrave, 2022)

- Best-selling author of "Decoding Crypto with Henri & Hodler" educational kids book (Brown Books Kids, 2024)

- Regularly featured/quoted in media (Bloomberg, CNBC, CNN, Financial Times, The Economist, Wall Street Journal)
	
- Recognized by HK courts as expert on FinTech matters, past member of Hong Kong securities regulator's (SFC) FinTech Advisory Group, HK central bank's HKIMR council of advisers as well as Dubai's DIFC Innovation Council and Ras Al-Khaimah Digital Assets Oasis

Speaking Engagements

- Speaker at >250 events globally across all continents including events like Davos, Milken Summit, Asian Financial Forum, WIEF, Consensus as well at numerous Fortune 100 internal and client events as well as 2x TEDx speaker.

Recent Awards

- LinkedIn Global Top Voice in Finance 

- Ranked #1 most influential individual on Finance globally on LinkedIn out of 50K+ individuals working at the top 48 professional services and management consulting firms in the world (Onalytica) 

- Named “highest profile FinTech consultant in Hong Kong” (Chambers)

- Milken Institute Young Leaders Circle

- Governor General of Canada Gold Medal for Academic Excellence

- Global "20 Rising Stars under 40" - Armenian Bar Association

- Future Leader Award - College Jean-de-Brebeuf 

- Fintech Changemaker of the Year - Asian Private Banker

How to contact Henri

For media inquiries and speaking engagements, please contact me: info@henriarslanian.com or visit www.henriarslanian.com

experience.description: Market neutral crypto hedge fund focused on generating alpha from inefficiencies in crypto markets using relative value, arbitrage, and quantitative strategies, >$200m AuM, >+20% annualized return since inception (USD, net), sharpe ratio >2.5,  >3 years track record, 1st crypto hedge fund to be licensed by Dubai's Virtual Assets Regulatory AuthorityOur mission is to become the world’s leading institutional grade crypto asset management firm.We believe that institutional investors want digital assets exposure but via fund managers who have an established digital assets track record, are regulated, have traditional finance experience and comply with the highest operational due diligence requirements.For more information: www.nineblockscapital.com or info@nineblockscapital.com

Henri is the Co-host of Crypto Weekly on CNBC Arabia, which is focused on covering the global crypto developments each week.The show reaches over 60 million households across the Middle-East and GCC on TV and millions more globally via social media channels.

2020-present: Adjunct Professor2015-2020: Adjunct Associate ProfessorSince 2015, Henri teaches the first FinTech university course in the world.  He currently teaches a full 36 hour crypto course titled “Introduction to Cryptocurrencies and Digital Assets” as part of the HKU MBA and Masters in Finance programs.He was previously a lecturer at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology in Hong Kong and at the University of Sherbrooke in Canada.Henri has won numerous teaching awards over the years.

Arslanian Media Group was set-up in 2020 to hold all of Henri Arslanian's IP rights and content (including the Crypto Capsule /The Future of Money / Henri & Hodler brands) across video, social media, newsletter, podcast, book and other mediums.This includes Henri's numerous best-selling books including:“The Book of Crypto” (Palgrave, 2022) - global top 10 best-seller in financial services“The Future of Finance” (Palgrave 2019) - global top 10 best-seller in financial services and recognized as one of the “Best FinTech Books of All Time” by Bookauthority.“Decoding Crypto with Henri & Hodler” (Brown Books Kids, 2024) - global #1 new release global top 5 best seller
